/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's view of the city's daily life. The street is lined with lush green trees and towering buildings, creating a vibrant contrast of nature and architecture. The sky above is a clear blue, adding to the overall brightness of the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of being in the midst of the action. The colors in the image are bright and vibrant, reflecting the lively atmosphere of the city.
